name: planet.ECO LLC
goal: planet.ECO LLC, was created to provide an Internet platform where those who are concerned about our planet can connect, engage, and find goods and services that promote sustainability. We want to be the global one-stop hub for relevant environmental and sustainable services. Whether it's sustainable technology, the availability of “green” jobs, social responsibility, environmentally-friendly services, “green” news – the possibilities are endless and .ECO is the hotspot.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Energy, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Information Society, Public Health, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives: We have not submitted any files or recommendations to the EU.
